channel.title: Magic Still casting
channel.description:
Hey on my server after leaving wildy magic on players still works..
And heres the if in AttackMage: [code]if (cCast == true && IsInWilderness(EnemyX, EnemyY, 1) == true || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Kingstun") || IsInCW2 == true || playerRights > 1 && own == true || inPk == true) {[/code]
By the way, cCast is set to FALSE! But the code still exexutes! I even have a sendMessage("Status:" + cCast); after the if and it sends false!! Whats wrong?? :(

item.title: Magic Still casting
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Hey on my server after leaving wildy magic on players still works…

And heres the if in AttackMage:

if (cCast == true && IsInWilderness(EnemyX, EnemyY, 1) == true || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Kingstun") || IsInCW2 == true || playerRights > 1 && own == true || inPk == true) {

By the way, cCast is set to FALSE! But the code still exexutes! I even have a sendMessage(“Status:” + cCast); after the if and it sends false!! Whats wrong??
